name: Starving
description: Starving is a great story about a deceased person called a zombie, who started to look for food in a strange place where he had found himself under unclear circumstances. Passing the tunnels along, he comes across a game console with a huge monitor, which will unfold all the game events.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 30 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
